item.title: Learning Portfolio
item.description:
Learning Portfolio

This portfolio documents my learning journey during the PhD, including:

Critical Reflections

  • Reflections on completed readings
  • Critical analysis of articles and works
  • Connections between different areas of knowledge

Skill Development

  • Technical skills developed
  • Methodological competencies
  • Scientific communication learning

Research Process

  • Work methodology
  • Challenges encountered
  • Solutions developed
  • Course adjustments

Academic Production

  • Articles in development
  • Presentations delivered
  • Event participation
  • Established collaborations

Next Steps

  • Short-term objectives
  • Medium-term goals
  • Long-term vision

This page will be regularly updated with new content and reflections.
